name: Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management State and Tribal Coordination
objective: To ensure that all oil, gas, and solid minerals originated on the public lands and on the Outer Continental Shelf are properly accounted for under the direction of the Secretary of the Interior, and for other purposes.
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: The program funded 15 cooperative agreements, 9 States and 6 tribal.
Collectively the cooperative agreements completed 61 audits and 178 compliance reviews.
Funding was provided for 15 cooperative agreements

authorizations.text: Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982, Public Law 97-451, as amended.

rules_regulations: 30 CFR 1228 Cooperative Agreement activities with States and Tribes.
